p: Should recovered people preserve their immunity against Covid-19 (γ in = 0 case), UV photons from the Sun may still be able to indirectly amplify contagions during autumns/winters (as a consequence of the attenuation during previous summers) and produce one additional wave of the SARS-CoV-2 epidemics at all latitudes (compare Figures 7A and 7B with Figures 7C and 7D, respectively). However, in about two years (and only 1 additional cycle), in the absence of antigenic drift or cross-mixing between groups at different latitudes, the epidemics will die out ( Figure 7B).
